details.description: When included, additional details about the contact provided through Data Add-ons will be available here.

email.description: The email address of the contact. (Queryable)

emailHash.description: Either an MD5 or SHA-256 hash representation of the email address to query. Be certain to lowercase and trim the email address prior to hashing. (Queryable)

facebook.description: URL of the contact's Facebook profile.

linkedin.description: URL of the contact's LinkedIn profile.

location.description: Location of the contact. Depending on data quality, the exactness of this value may vary.

organization.description: Current or most recent place of work.

title.description: Current or most recent job title.

twitter.description: Twitter handle of the contact. Acceptable formats include handle (with or without "@"), as well as the URL to the profile. (Queryable)
